verses.verse: And when <WH1961> Abram <WH87> was ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine, <WH8672> the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> to Abram, <WH87> and said <WH559> to him, I am the Almighty <WH7706> God; <WH410> walk <WH1980> before <WH6440> me, and be you perfect. <WH8549>
And I will make <WH5414> my covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and you, and will multiply <WH7235> you exceedingly. <WH3966>
And Abram <WH87> fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> his face: <WH6440> and God <WH430> talked <WH1696> with him, saying, <WH559>
As for me, behold, <WH2009> my covenant <WH1285> is with you, and you shall be a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations. <WH1471>

Neither <WH3808> shall your name <WH8034> any <WH5750> more <WH5750> be called <WH7121> Abram, <WH87> but your name <WH8034> shall be Abraham; <WH85> for a father <WH1> of many <WH1995> nations <WH1471> have I made <WH5414> you.
And I will make you exceeding <WH3966> fruitful, <WH6509> and I will make <WH5414> nations <WH1471> of you, and kings <WH4428> shall come <WH3318> out of you.

And I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and you and your seed <WH2233> after <WH310> you in their generations <WH1755> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285> to be a God <WH430> to you, and to your seed <WH2233> after <WH310> you.

And I will give <WH5414> to you, and to your seed <WH2233> after <WH310> you, the land <WH776> wherein you are a stranger, <WH4033> all the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> for an everlasting <WH5769> possession; <WH272> and I will be their God. <WH430>
And God <WH430> said <WH559> to Abraham, <WH85> You shall keep <WH8104> my covenant <WH1285> therefore, you, and your seed <WH2233> after <WH310> you in their generations. <WH1755>

This <WH2063> is my covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> you shall keep, <WH8104> between <WH996> me and you and your seed <WH2233> after <WH310> you; Every <WH3605> man <WH2145> child among you shall be circumcised. <WH4135>
And you shall circumcise <WH5243> the flesh <WH1320> of your foreskin; <WH6190> and it shall be a token <WH226> of the covenant <WH1285> between <WH996> me and you.

And he that is eight <WH8083> days <WH3117> old <WH1121> shall be circumcised <WH4135> among you, every <WH3605> man <WH2145> child in your generations, <WH1755> he that is born <WH3211> in the house, <WH1004> or bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of any <WH3605> stranger, <WH1121> <WH5235> which <WH834> is not of your seed. <WH2233>

He that is born <WH3211> in your house, <WH1004> and he that is bought <WH4736> with your money, <WH3701> must needs <WH4135> be circumcised: <WH4135> and my covenant <WH1285> shall be in your flesh <WH1320> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant. <WH1285>

And the uncircumcised <WH6189> man <WH2145> child whose <WH834> flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin <WH6190> is not circumcised, <WH4135> that soul <WH5315> shall be cut <WH3772> off from his people; <WH5971> he has broken <WH6565> my covenant. <WH1285>
And God <WH430> said <WH559> to Abraham, <WH85> As for Sarai <WH8297> your wife, <WH802> you shall not call <WH7121> her name <WH8034> Sarai, <WH8297> but Sarah <WH8283> shall her name <WH8034> be.

And I will bless <WH1288> her, and give <WH5414> you a son <WH1121> also <WH1571> of her: yes, I will bless <WH1288> her, and she shall be a mother of nations; <WH1471> kings <WH4428> of people <WH5971> shall be of her.

Then Abraham <WH85> fell <WH5307> on his face, <WH6440> and laughed, <WH6711> and said <WH559> in his heart, <WH3820> Shall a child be born <WH3205> to him that is an hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old? <WH1121> and shall Sarah, <WH8283> that is ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old, <WH1323> bear? <WH3205>
And Abraham <WH85> said <WH559> to God, <WH430> O that Ishmael <WH3458> might live <WH2421> before <WH6440> you!

And God <WH430> said, <WH559> Sarah <WH8283> your wife <WH802> shall bear <WH3205> you a son <WH1121> indeed; <WH61> and you shall call <WH7121> his name <WH8034> Isaac: <WH3327> and I will establish <WH6965> my covenant <WH1285> with him for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285> and with his seed <WH2233> after <WH310> him.

And as for Ishmael, <WH3458> I have heard <WH8085> you: Behold, <WH2009> I have blessed <WH1288> him, and will make him fruitful, <WH6509> and will multiply <WH7235> him exceedingly; <WH3966> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> princes <WH5387> shall he beget, <WH3205> and I will make <WH5414> him a great <WH1419> nation. <WH1471>
But my covenant <WH1285> will I establish <WH6965> with Isaac, <WH3327> which <WH834> Sarah <WH8283> shall bear <WH3205> to you at this <WH2088> set <WH4150> time in the next <WH312> year. <WH8141>
And he left <WH3615> off talking <WH1696> with him, and God <WH430> went <WH5927> up from Abraham. <WH85>

And Abraham <WH85> took <WH3947> Ishmael <WH3458> his son, <WH1121> and all <WH3605> that were born <WH3211> in his house, <WH1004> and all <WH3605> that were bought <WH4736> with his money, <WH3701> every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among the men <WH582> of Abraham's <WH85> house; <WH1004> and circumcised <WH4135> the flesh <WH1320> of their foreskin <WH6190> in the selfsame <WH2088> <WH6106> day, <WH3117> as God <WH430> had said <WH1696> to him.
And Abraham <WH85> was ninety <WH8673> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and nine, <WH8672> when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin. <WH6190>
And Ishmael <WH3458> his son <WH1121> was thirteen <WH7969> <WH6240> years <WH8141> old, <WH1121> when he was circumcised <WH4135> in the flesh <WH1320> of his foreskin. <WH6190>
In the selfsame <WH2088> <WH6106> day <WH3117> was Abraham <WH85> circumcised, <WH4135> and Ishmael <WH3458> his son. <WH1121>

And all <WH3605> the men <WH582> of his house, <WH1004> born <WH3211> in the house, <WH1004> and bought <WH4736> with money <WH3701> of the stranger, <WH1121> <WH5235> were circumcised <WH4135> with him.
